setMultipleVins

public void setMultipleVins(boolean hasMultipleVins)
Set whether or not the uptaker page container more than one Vin instances.

Parameters:
hasMultipleVins - boolean indicating whether or not the uptaker page has more than one vin instances

addSearchGroup

public void addSearchGroup(java.lang.String graphVin,
                           java.lang.String searchVin)
Add a search group which contains the visualization being searched and the Vin displaying the search result.

Parameters:
graphVin - The visualization showing the data.
searchVin - The search vin displaying search results.

addDependencyGraphGroup

public void addDependencyGraphGroup(java.lang.String dependencyGraphVin,
                                    java.lang.String dependencyMapVin,
                                    java.lang.String searchVin)
Add a dependency graph group which contains 3 visualizations of the same model.

Parameters:
dependencyGraphVin - The graph visualization (main visualization)
dependencyMapVin - The map visualization (of the same model)
searchVin - The search vin displaying the search results (optional, set to null if there is no search vin)

addStateListener

public void addStateListener(java.lang.String srcVINId,
                             VinState.StateType stateType,
                             java.lang.String listenerId)
Add a particular uptaker state listener.

Parameters:
srcVINId - source vinId which sent the state change event. This can be obtained by listening onto EvnVinStateEvent contextual events.
stateType - the state type of the event.
listenerId - uptaker listenerId interested for this state type.

build

public CommunicationConfiguration build()
Build the CommunicationConfiguration object from previously provided information.

Returns:
the CommunicationConfiguration object being built.
